text: Szymon Sićko (born 20 August 1997) is a Polish handball player for Łomża Vive Kielce and the Polish national team. ==Career== He made his debut for the national team on 8 June 2017, in a friendly match against Sweden (27:33). He threw his first goal on 28 December 2018, in a match against Japan (29:28). He represented Poland at the 2020 European Men's Handball Championship.2020 European Men's Handball Championship squad ==References== ==External links== * Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Polish male handball players Category:Expatriate handball players Category:Polish expatriate sportspeople in Germany Category:Vive Kielce players Category:Handball- Bundesliga players
title: Szymon Sićko
